website_summaries.verdict: Almost as sturdy and chatty as the sponge himself, hearing Stretchpants exclaim things like Spongecercize! and Now that’s a stretch! never gets old.
pros: Hear Spongebob say 30-plus silly things as you stretch his arms and legs
Great for 2 kids to tug on at once

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my five year old!!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old son is currently obsessed with SpongeBob and so I wanted a toy he could carry around with him. He LOVES this! It is VERRRY sturdy (it also survives the often kidnap from his 1 1/2 year old bro) and even with it having noise option via a switch it’s not too annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Haley C.

customer_reviews.title: Study lil sucker
customer_reviews.text: Not many Spongebob toys to pick from nowadays. My 3 year old just got into him earlier this year. He loves the toy and enjoys that he talks. Spongebob has been slammed onto the ground and thrown by a 3 year old and 1 year old. I’d say I’m getting my money’s worth and the kids love him.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: not that durable
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old stretched one of the arms a little too far and it stopped working the same day she got it. one arm works still and one leg, this is fun but not so tough. the real spongebob takes a beating in every episode and laughs it off, this one, is not as cool as the real SB
customer_reviews.author: JasonReviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Great product in great shape. Packaging still in wonderful condition. Everything works perfect, my niece is going to absolutely love for her birthday. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferlynnb

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. The rubberized texture of the entire Spongebob is nice. The sounds work well with the stretching limbs activating them.
customer_reviews.author: Zgonzo

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves spongebob and likes the rubbery parts and the speaking
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but mechanics are not 100%
customer_reviews.text: Gave this toy to my son who loves spongebob for Valentine's day and he absolutely loves it but after a day and barely pulling the limbs for sounds at all and he told me that just after a day one arm and one leg stopped activating the sound. He still loves it but its unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: mjmc22

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap!!!
customer_reviews.text: The toy is defective. Only one arm and one leg work. And Amazon refuses to send me a mailing label to return this piece of crap!!! I requested a replacement, which I promptly received. However, it has the very same defects, in addition to a crunched-up package. I still can't get a return mail label for the original POC. Anyone got any suggestions???
customer_reviews.author: RPV Stephany

customer_reviews.title: BOO!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my grandson for his birthday. Opened at the party, and he was so excited to get it out of the box. Once out; they pulled on the arm a few times; and then it came off. Bool.. the end
customer_reviews.author: Martha Peterman

customer_reviews.title: This is the version that only comes with Sponagebob, no mystery characters box
customer_reviews.text: Sponagebob body is kinda heavy. Takes a lot of force to stretch the arms and legs. Sounds don't always come on when stretching. My kids frequently ask me why sponagebob doesn't say anything when they stretch it. Not really a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge Spongebob fan and this was a birthday gift. The quality seems good, packaging was adorable, and he makes some really cool sounds when you stretch his arms. My son really loved this Spongebob toy.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Mickletz

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: kids love it! Super fun. The kids 9 & 5 have stretched the heck out of it & it’s still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: stonelake

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 10 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: Well, if you stretch it gently it will last. If you pull it as intended, it breaks. It just broke too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who lives in a pineapple under the sea
customer_reviews.text: Wanna annoy another parent? You do? Great! This is the toy to do it with. Trust me...
customer_reviews.author: dana luberts

customer_reviews.title: Spongebob sound quality is to low
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew the quality of the sound was not good. You can hardly hear what he is saying...I thought his arms would stretch farther...don’t waste your money on this particular toy
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just got him today and he only works on one side and then sometimes he doesn’t work disappointed
customer_reviews.author: danni

customer_reviews.title: Used toy
customer_reviews.text: This came dirty with a broken box. I’m sure it was not “new”
customer_reviews.author: house of dogs

customer_reviews.title: Sponge Bob Square Pants
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected 🙂 Very sturdy, stretchy, and loud like Sponge Bob.
customer_reviews.author: Djinn

customer_reviews.title: Its a good gift for the Soonge Bob lover
customer_reviews.text: Only one arm and one leg react for sayings. And they dont stretch very long. But its still a cool gift for the sponge bob fan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids/ adults will love it
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so fun my 10 month old ABSOLUTELY loves it , the toy does exactly what it was supposed to its hilariously entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hamby

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today about 30 minutes ago. I haven't even opened it. But you can still test it out without opening it And only one of the arms work. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: eric aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy toy..kind of heavy
customer_reviews.text: Study toy, bought for my 5 year old grandson for Christmas....still works!😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a birthday present. My nephew loves it and I haven't heard about any issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift Bought for my toddler Just wish it said more phrases
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for gift for my grandsons birthday he love it
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Very good material
customer_reviews.text: Very good and resistant material. SpongeBob had passed the test with my son, until he decided to cut his nose with a scissors, now he doesn't want it. Kids....
customer_reviews.author: Niobe

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Only one arm and one leg work. I’ve had it replaced 3 times and it’s the same thing ! It’s cheaply made. Some of the paint has chipped off of it!! We haven’t even opened it yet, it’s a Christmas present so it’s not been used or anything like that. This toy is not worth 20 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Arm came off after a few days when stretched.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son, he loved it, but after a few days of playing with it he pulled on the arm and it came off...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little toy ... my grandson is 5 and he loves it ... it’s a tough toy because my grandson is rough 😃 and it’s holding up well !
customer_reviews.author: sydebity

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my nephew started playing with it was broken, i replaced it and the same thing happened again. I wouldn’t waste your money on it
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy kid fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this toy and I love that it is sturdy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy SpongeBob
customer_reviews.text: SpongeBob is great, and my 9 year old loves it. Stretchy arms and nose, various phrases. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BH36609

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and still play with it all the time.. very durable.. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Wesser

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We just got our spongebob today. When I opened it I did not notice it but my son did. Spongebob’s nose is cut off. We are very disappointed with this order!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Would be fin if worked correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was damaged upon arrival, ripped box and plastic broken. Batteries dead on arrival. Only one arm and one leg work.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without the back cover for the battery and 1 battery missing!
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Priceless!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson for his birthday. The joy of watching him unwrap it and the excitement on his face when he saw it was priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: May or may not work properly
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a replacement because only one arm and one leg worked. The replacement had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Sheats

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it! They stretch the arms and legs and get spongebobs voice talking to them. Although not very audible but good enough..
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Maloo

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson 2 weeks ago and it has not left his side.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by how well made it is. Son loves this funny little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia N

customer_reviews.title: Not SUPER Stretchy
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable, my son loves it, but not very sturdy. One of his arms came off the 2nd day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Turner

customer_reviews.title: He loved it
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday present for my baby cousin, it was the first gift he wanted to play with right off the bat.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Arm was pulled off by a 18 month old baby. Sounds we’re skipping

customer_reviews.title: Spongebob
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves his sponge bob toy. He got it for Christmas and plays with it almost everyday.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Everything that my son wanted. He's a sturdy toy and holds up to being dragged around the house.

customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson for christmas . The toy is not what worth the price you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: A waste to buy

customer_reviews.title: Detail 👌👌

customer_reviews.title: My son will be satisfied

product_meta.title: SpongeBob SquarePants, Stretchpants Figure, Stretchable, +30 Wacky Sounds
product_meta.description: Whooaaa!!! Play with SpongeBob in a crazy new way! Stretch spongebob’s arms and legs to hear over 30 silly sounds and phrases! Play with your friends – grab an arm and a leg and keep pulling to hear what he will say next! Silly and fun phrases include “I'm a sponge, not a rubber band!” “spongecercize,” and “these pants sure are reliable!” SpongeBob stretchpants is made for fans ages 4+. 2x AA batteries required.
feature_bullets: Stretchable: it's the stretch day ever! Play with SpongeBob in a crazy new way!
Whooaaa!!!: stretch spongebob’s arms and legs to hear over 30 silly sounds and phrases!
Two can play at this: play with your friends – Grab an arm and a leg and keep pulling to hear what he will say next!
Spongebob stretchpants is made for fans ages 4+.
Includes one SpongeBob SquarePants stretchpants interactive toy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars452 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
